name: CarNG
description:
This is a racing game with a twist: you can't pick your ideal car. This choice is out of control in CarNG! You get  a random car every ten seconds!

This is a local multiplayer game. Player one controls their car using WASD, Player two uses arrow keys.

The track has shortcuts, so pick the best route for your car. Well, your current one, at least ;)

The original idea was a single player race, with three AI opponents. Guiding an AI around the track turned out to be too much for our time, so we changed to a two player game in the last 30 mins.
